learningpod.title: Kaplan Kids (Reading): The word sewer has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which sewer means "a...

questionBody.p: The word sewer has more than one meaning. Choose the sentence in which sewer means "an underground channel."

simpleChoice.p: A vast sewer system has been draining the city's water since the 13th century.
I need to learn to be a good sewer so I can stitch and repair my own clothes.
If the woman doesn't give me the money she owes me, I am going to sewer.
